itunes:title: Larry Kosilla (Detailer, @AMMONYC)
itunes:author: Matt Farah & Zack Klapman
itunes:summary:
Larry Kosilla is one of the most respected  and well-known automotive detailers in the world. His YouTube channel is full of DIY advice, tutorials, and videos showing him turning disgusting barn finds into shining show pieces.
How to detail your car: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYsa8SOy3TkoxI5D17s1u-w
Support Larry's game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1433570/Car_Detailing_Simulator/
Everything to care for your car: https://www.ammonyc.com/
